00033 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00034 #include "AWShape2DB1.hpp"
00035 #include "MsqMatrix.hpp"
00036 #include "MsqError.hpp"
00037 #include "TMPDerivs.hpp"
00038 
00039 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00040 
00041 std::string AWShape2DB1::get_name() const
00042   { return "AWShape2DB1"; }
00043 
00044 AWShape2DB1::~AWShape2DB1() {}
00045 
00046 bool AWShape2DB1::evaluate( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& A, 
00047                             const MsqMatrix<2,2>& W, 
00048                             double& result, 
00049                             MsqError& err )
00050 {
00051   const double alpha = det(A);
00052   const double omega = det(W);
00053   const double prod = alpha * omega;
00054   if (AWMetric::invalid_determinant( prod ))
00055   {
00056     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg_aw, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00057     return false;
00058   }
00059   
00060   result =  sqr_Frobenius(A * adj(W));
00061   result += sqr_Frobenius(W * adj(A));
00062   result *= 0.25/prod;
00063   result -= 1.0;
00064   return true;
00065 }
